title: shall be applicable to the Central Govt
clause_text: shall be applicable to the Central Govt. and their statutory bodies/Central Govt. undertaking/State Govt. undertaking etc. except State Govt. and MCGM itself.
section: Floor Space Indices in Residential, Commercial and Industrial Zones
